channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Shiro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Shiro

item.title: CVE-2023-46750|2024-08-08T13:05:17.314Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20shiro
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability when "form" authentication is used in Apache Shiro. Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.13.0+ or 2.0.0-alpha-4+.
